title.rendered: Amazon Product Launch in 2020 with Jon Tilley of ZonGuru

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 31:31 — 24.1MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

When you have an Amazon product launch in 2020, you will compete with big brands who spend on paid search, so you need to know what you are doing.

What are the biggest mistakes you see with people who HAVE picked a good product post-launch?

If you pick the right product, your biggest issue is going to be staying in stock. 

Mistake #1 – getting the velocity of sales

For all the sellers on page 1, how many do I need to make on a daily basis to get to and stay on p. 1

Mistake #2 – not doing enough keyword research for targeting the right keywords  for high conversion rate

Amazon wants to make money from you –  

Business metrics 

What metrics do you feel Amazon sellers should be looking at that they often don’t?

Why are those important?

Tools

Profit and loss

Business valuation calculator – net margin annualised!

Best performers – and also worst!

  • Profit margin, sales
  • Return rates
  • Reviews

Business valuation estimate

Based on 

  • The stock you have
  • Net margin over a certain time annualised 

Evolution of the industry 

Jon started Amazon in 2014 based in Los Angeles 

Originally 

Early Amazon had:  

  • Bad tech 
  • A bad search and display experience. 
  • And bad customer listings. 

Seller photos and listings are so much better. 

Is Amazon too competitive?

This conversation was happening in 2014!

It’s still worth going into Amazon in 2019 but you need to know what you’re doing. 

Using data in 2020 

Using a data-centric approach to finding products is more important than it was. 

Nowadays the days of generic everyday products are gone. 

You’re now competing with bigger brands now who are spending big money on paid search.

If you’re new, you want to play in small niches where the big brands don’t go. 

Amazon has to keep customers engaged

So if you launch a product that is 

  • Differentiated
  • More connected to a customer 
  • The Amazon algorithm is incentivised to give you a shot
  • Bringing the latest, greatest, most evolved product.

Pick a niche where you can easily develop a range of products

If you can leverage existing supplier to launch products 4,5, 6 

Other ways to connect

The Instagram channel launched in mid-2019  at Zonguru

Channel dedicated to amazon product ideas and inspiration

Hot and not hot products. 

How to differentiate products

Benefit overlays

New 4-part video service “2020 perfect vision”

2020.zonguru.com 

Total about 2 ½ hours of really solid content – people are loving it!

How to use data to find products etc. 

Also full “hot product” ebook – how to validate a product opportunity – evaluating products

Plus 20 hot products for 2020. 

“Zonguru”

Free tools on the site – ASIN index checker 

Free mobile app – on the Apple Store and Google Play

If you sell in multiple markets, it displays your sales and key sales data in one view. 

There’s a “cha-ching” that makes a noise when you make a sale. 

If you get to $500K you get slot machine. 

 

USING ZONGURU

amazingfba.com/zonguru 

Best way to provide value – just charge $1 for the first month – try for 30 days

Once you choose a package, there is a lot of flexibility on the tools you use. 

 

 

Some of the links on this page are affiliate links, which means that if you choose to make a purchase, I will earn a commission. This commission comes at no additional cost to you. Please understand that I have experience with all of these companies, and I recommend them because they are helpful and useful, not because of the small commissions I make if you decide to buy something. Please do not spend any money on these products unless you feel you need them or that they will help you achieve your goals.

Watch my full interview with Jin Tilley
